ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Unpopular view...
ygData.msgSnippet: lol, bite your tounge!  I don t get to play much and I want all the exp I can get.  Seriously thought, I have mixed feelings.  It is good for people like me
ygData.messageBody:
lol, bite your tounge! I don't get to play much and I want all the exp I
can get. Seriously thought, I have mixed feelings. It is good for people
like me who are not power gamers and want to eventually see a dragon (I
have been playing since beta 4).

-Steve
39 Bard

>I played in Karnors last night with a warrior, cleric, monk, and
>ranger... all I have to say is I earned as much exp in the two hours
>I was there last night as I had in 6+ hour camps before (and the
>group was not any better.)
>
>Does anyone else think maybe the exp is now coming too fast?
>
>
>Gaelthorne
>Xegony
